Julius Erving

Julius Winfield Erving II ▪ Twitter: JuliusErving

(Dr. J, The Doctor, J.W., The Claw, Black Moses, Houdini, Little Hawk, Doc, Julie, Super Julius)

Position: Small Forward ▪ Shoots: Right

6-7, 210lb (201cm, 95kg)

Born: February 22, 1950 (Age: 73-157d) in Roosevelt, New York us

Relatives: Cousin Jeff Halliburton

College: UMass

High School: Roosevelt in Roosevelt, New York

Draft: Milwaukee Bucks, 1st round (12th pick, 12th overall), 1972 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 22, 1976 ▪ ABA Debut: October 15, 1971

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player in 1993 (Full List)

Career Length: 16 years

Transactions

April 5, 1971: Signed a contract with the Virginia Squires.

April 10, 1972: Drafted by the Milwaukee Bucks in the 1st round (12th pick) of the 1972 NBA Draft.

July 31, 1973: Traded by the Virginia Squires with Willie Sojourner to the New York Nets for cash, George Carter and Kermit Washington.

June 17, 1976: Moved from the ABA to the NBA with the New York Nets.

October 20, 1976: Player rights sold by the New York Nets to the Philadelphia 76ers.

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Julius Erving?

Julius Erving is 73 years old.

Where was Julius Erving born?

Julius Erving was born in Roosevelt, New York.

When was Julius Erving born?

Julius Erving was born on February 22, 1950.

How tall is Julius Erving?

Julius Erving is 6-7 (201 cm) tall.

How much did Julius Erving weigh when playing?

Julius Erving weighed 210 lbs (95 kg) when playing.

Is Julius Erving in the Hall of Fame?

Julius Erving was inducted to the Hall of Fame as a Player in 1993 (Full List) .

When was Julius Erving drafted?

Julius Erving was drafted by Milwaukee Bucks, 1st round (12th pick, 12th overall), 1972 NBA Draft.

What position did Julius Erving play?

Small Forward.

When did Julius Erving retire?

Julius Erving last played in 1987.

What is Julius Erving's net worth?

Julius Erving made at least $2,539,000 playing professional basketball.

How much did Julius Erving make?

Julius Erving made $1,485,000 in 1986.

What did Julius Erving average?

Julius Erving averaged 24.2 points, 8.5 rebounds, and 4.2 assists per game.

How many rings does Julius Erving have?

Julius Erving won 3 championships.

What is Julius Erving's Twitter account?

Julius Erving is on Twitter at JuliusErving.

What schools did Julius Erving attend?

Julius Erving attended Roosevelt in Roosevelt, New York and UMass.

What are Julius Erving's nicknames?

Dr. J, The Doctor, J.W., The Claw, Black Moses, Houdini, Little Hawk, Doc, Julie, Super Julius are nicknames for Julius Erving.
